alert.note: Alert for Kofa; Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 07 at 7:36AM MST until January 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM MST /MIDNIGHT PST/ TO 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s to lower 30s. * WHERE...In Arizona, Kofa. In California, Imperial Valley and Palo Verde Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM MST /midnight PST/ to 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
